main.name: David Mwangi Wanjiru
main.bio: I'm a Frontend Software Developer proficient in ReactJS, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. With expertise in JavaScript and Node.js, I craft seamless web experiences and responsive designs. Skilled in Git and Python, I prioritize software quality and efficient workflows. Passionate about bug tracking and resolution, I'm committed to excellence in software development. Currently I'm The Frontend Developer and Technical Lead @MMUSTihub, I'm dedicated to continuous learning and innovation.

education.school: Masinde Murilo University Of Science And Technology
education.description: Currently Am On My Final Year

projects.title: VIDMIND
projects.description: VIDMIND is a system designed to automatically summarize, analyze, and extract key information from YouTube video content. By leveraging text embeddings and natural language processing techniques, VIDMIND aims to provide users with concise summaries and key insights, reducing the need for manual video viewing and note-taking.

projects.title: VIDMIND
projects.description: VIDMIND is a video streaming platform that allows users to watch movies and TV shows. It has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to navigate through the app. Users can search for movies and TV shows by genre, release date, and popularity. They can also create playlists of their favorite movies and TV shows. VIDMIND is available on the web, iOS, and Android platforms.

testimonials.text: David is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
